name: dev_tools_quality_gate
description: Validate artifacts against JSON Schema and run acceptance criteria. Emits structured pass/fail gate results for pipeline orchestration.

name: dev_tools_multi_model_review
description: Finding-processing engine: deduplicates findings from multiple reviewer agents, runs cost/benefit analysis, and detects drift between documents. Accepts pre-collected ReviewerFindings[] â€” no external API calls.

name: dev_tools_trace_collector
description: Validates execution trace event streams and computes deterministic run-level metrics for latency, costs, failures, gate outcomes, and phase transitions.
